sentence.Network_en: The lorry driver escaped unhurt, but a pedestrian was injured.
sentence.Network_cn: 卡车司机安然脱险，但有一位行人受了伤。

sentence.Network_en: More than a third of all pedestrian injuries are to children.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有受伤的行人中有1/3以上是儿童。

sentence.Network_en: I drove home contemplating my own more pedestrian lifestyle.
sentence.Network_cn: 我开车回家，一路上思考着自己更为乏味的生活方式。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from French pédestre or Latin pedester 'going on foot', also 'written in prose' + -ian. Early use in English was in the description of writing as 'prosaic'

entry.def: A pedestrian is a person who is walking, especially in a town or city, rather than travelling in a vehicle.

example.ex: In Los Angeles a pedestrian is a rare spectacle...
example.tran: 在洛杉矶很少见到步行者。

example.ex: More than a third of all pedestrian injuries are to children.
example.tran: 所有受伤的行人中有1/3以上是儿童。

entry.tran: 平庸的；乏味的；平淡无奇的
entry.def: If you describe something as pedestrian, you mean that it is ordinary and not at all interesting.

example.ex: His style is so pedestrian that the book becomes a real bore...
example.tran: 他的文风十分平庸，那本书乏味至极。

example.ex: I drove home contemplating my own more pedestrian lifestyle.
example.tran: 我开车回家，一路上思考着自己更为乏味的生活方式。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who travels by foot

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =foot,表示"足,脚"; 2. =child/education,表示"儿童"; 3. 引申为"教育"

stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+ped足,脚+ient→能把脚跨出去→方便
expedite[v.使加速,促进]+ious……的→adj.迅速的,敏捷的
ped足,脚+estrian……的人→用脚走路的人
bi两+ped足,脚→n.两足动物
centi一百+ped足,脚+e→一百只脚的动物
ex出+ped足,脚+ient→能把脚跨出去→方便
expedite[v.使加速,促进]+ion→n.远征[队],探险[队]
impedi=impede[v.妨碍]+ment物→n.妨碍,阻碍物
ped足,脚+al→n.踏板 v.踩踏板,骑自行车
ped足,脚+estrian……的人→用脚走路的人
pod=ped足,脚+iatrist专家→n.足病医生
quadru四+ped足,脚→n.四足动物
ped教育+agog引导+y→引导教学→教学法
ped教育+ant人→受过教育的人→书呆子
pedant[n.迂腐之人,书呆子]+ry状态,性质→n.迂腐
ped儿童+istiatr专家,医生→n.儿科医师
ped儿童+ology学科→n.儿科学
ex出+ped足,脚+ite促成→把脚跨出去→加快
im进入+ped足,脚+e→把脚放进去→妨碍
ped足,脚+al→n.踏板 v.踩踏板,骑自行车

sentences.en: The pedestrian stopped at the curbside.
The cop signaled traffic to halt to allow pedestrians to cross the street.
sentences.cn: 警察指示车辆停下以便让行人过街。
